tuv.seg: Gerry has been working part-time (10 hours a week) for 6 months with a takeaway restaurant
Tá Gerry ag obair go páirtaimseartha (10 n-uaire in aghaidh na seachtaine) le 6 mhí anuas i mbialann mearbhia
He decides that he will join a trade union because the conditions in the job are bad
Socraíonn sé ballraíocht a ghlacadh le ceardchumann toisc go bhfuil coinníollacha sa phost go dona
None of the other employees is in a union
Níl duine ar bith de na fostaithe eile i gceardchumann
He is showing some information he got from the union to a fellow employee when his employer comes into the takeaway and sees what Gerry is doing
Tá sé ag taispeáint faisnéise a fuair sé ón gceardchumann do chomhghleacaí leis nuair a thagann a fhostóir isteach sa bhialann mearbhia agus tugann sé faoi deara cad atá ar siúl ag Gerry
At finishing time that day, the employer tells Gerry he no longer needs his services as demand has dropped
Ag deireadh an lae oibre, deireann an fostóir le Gerry nach bhfuil a chuid seirbhísí ag teastáil níos mó toisc titim ar chúrsaí éilimh
What rights does Gerry have?
Cad iad na cearta atá ag Gerry?
Gerry has been working for the employer for less than a year, so in normal circumstances he would not be able to bring a claim for unfair dismissal
Tá níos lú ná bliain caite ag Gerry ag obair don fhostóir, agus faoi ghnáthchúinsí ní bheadh sé ábalta éileamh a dhéanamh maidir le dífhostú éagórach
However, this requirement does not apply to a dismissal for trade union activity
Mar sin féin, ní bhaineann an riachtanas seo le dífhostú toisc gníomhaíocht cheardchumainn
It would appear that Gerry’s dismissal is related to his employer’s discovery that he had been in contact with a union
Is cosúil go bhfuil dífhostú Gerry bainteach leis an bhfostóir ag fáil amach go raibh teagmháil aige le ceardchumann
This gives Gerry a strong case to argue that this discovery was the reason for the dismissal and not a drop in demand
Tá cás láidir ag Gerry dá réir le cruthú gurb í seo cúis an dífhostaithe agus ní titim ar chúrsaí éilimh
Gerry could bring his case for unfair dismissal to the Workplace Relations Commission using the online complaint form available on workplacerelations.ie

Ba chóir do Gerry a iarratas ar dhífhostú éagórach ag eascairt ó ghníomhaíocht cheardchumainn a thabhairt faoi bhráid an Choimisiúin um Chaidreamh san Áit Oibre tríd an fhoirm ghearáin ar líne a úsáid á fáil ar workplacerelations.ie
